EmailTemplate.name: Sales Generic Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for requesting information from ACV
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
We are excited for you to learn more about ACV Auctions. One of our experienced business development representatives will be reaching out to you shortly.
In the interim, if you have any questions please call us directly at 1-800-553-4070.
Sincerely,
Dealership Onboarding Team
